attributes.action: Decriminalise and regulate cannabis use for adults.
attributes.additional_details: This will help boost tourism, and create a new lucrative industry post covid-19. Canada generated approximately 180+million Canadian dollars in the first month of legalisation, the Uk can position itself in Europe to benefit from cannabis tax, which could contribute to fund the NHS and public schools...
attributes.background: The parliament should look at the opportunities that legalisation of cannabis can bring to the Uk post covid-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300201
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300475
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318654
